idea:
We have a IoT and Image Processing based Platform, on which first application that has been developed is for end-to-end Smart Vehicle Parking Management System. Platform uses Image Processing as technology, using very low cost Video Cameras and by using our Algorithms for determining decision points such as License Plate Recognition (Image to text conversion), Occupancy detection (image processing), make/model of the vehicles, movement of the object upto Facial Recognition (last three under development).

We have developed S/W platform, Hardware Platform and mobile app for Smart Vehicle Parking Management system.

We have named our Platform as "HawkEye Parking"!!


HawkEye Parking
